fairy_sparklers.name: Fairy Sparklers
fairy_sparklers.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

snakes.name: snakes
snakes.description: Little Black things that grow out of pellets when lit, family safe.

snap pops.name: Snap pops
snap pops.description: Throw them on the the ground and they make a tiny pop noise, family safe.

bottle rockets.name: bottle rockets
bottle rockets.description: Light them and they fly in the air with a loud report.

firecracker.name: firecracker
firecracker.description: Light them and they blowup, loud but small explosion.

mortar shell.name: mortar shell
mortar shell.description: Scaled down version version of a professional fireworks display.

big bang mortar.name: big bang mortar
big bang mortar.description: Commercial mortar flies in the air with little display and a loud report.

happy face mortar.name: happy face mortar
happy face mortar.description: Commercial mortar flies in the air with displays a happy face with report.

fire fountain.name: fire fountain
fire fountain.description: Commercial fire displayed fountain shoots multi-colored flames 50 feet high.

nitroglycerin.name: nitroglycerin
nitroglycerin.description: Highly volatile liquid used to make dynamite.

dynamite.name: dynamite
dynamite.description: Dynamite combines nitroglycerin with adsorbents and stabilizers, rendering it safe to use, but retaining the powerful explosive properties of nitroglycerin

RDX.name: RDX
RDX.description: RDX is an explosive nitroamine widely used in military and industrial applications. It was developed as an explosive which was more powerful than TNT

IDE.name: IDE
IDE.description: We found anything that could blow up and put it in a 5 gallon bucket with a detonater.

hillbilly hand grenade.name: hillbilly hand grenade
hillbilly hand grenade.description: Small barrel of black power with a fuse

rocket propelled canon ball.name: rocket propelled canon ball
rocket propelled canon ball.description: A 50 pound cannon ball with 1500lb thrust rocket attached to it.

refurbished MX missle.name: refurbished MX missle
refurbished MX missle.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

Hydrogen Bomb.name: Hydrogen Bomb
Hydrogen Bomb.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

Thermo-Nuclear Missle.name: Thermo-Nuclear Missle
Thermo-Nuclear Missle.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.
